[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.MultiToken/TokenContract_Views.cs] [Function: GetSymbolByAlias()] [Circular References] Can an alias be set to point to another alias, creating circular references that cause infinite loops or unexpected symbol resolution? (Medium)
